name: ALLIANCE OF RAIL NEW ENTRANTS
goal: To represent private freight and passenger rail companies and pursiue the full market opening of rail markets across Europe.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Environment, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: We follow all rail -related topics. This includes the 4th Rail Package, the revision of rail passenger rights, access to facilities implementing act, all rail freight corridor initiatives and the work of the European Agency for Railways.
